# Problem Statement

In this notebook we will explore how to do Automatic Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) on the Tabular Playground Series January 2022 dataset using [D-Tale](https://dtale.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).

We are going to cover the following steps:
1. Install D-Tale
2. Import Libraries
3. Load Dataset
4. Print Report
5. References

Let's get started.

# Install D-Tale
